text: Augusto Boal (16 March 1931 - 2 May 2009) was a Brazilian theatre director, writer and politician. He was the founder of Theatre of the Oppressed. Boal served one term as a Vereador (the Brazilian version of a city councillor) in Rio de Janeiro from 1993 to 1997. He developed the legislative theatre. Boal died from respiratory failure caused by leukemia, aged 78. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1931 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Politicians from Rio de Janeiro Category:Writers from Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian theatre directors
